Description: Decrease of red blood cells or hemoglobin (boolean)
Level of the CPK enzyme in the blood (mcg/L)
Percentage of blood leaving the heart at each contraction (percentage)
Level of serum creatinine in the blood (mg/dL)
Level of serum sodium in the blood (mEq/L)
If the patient died due to heart failure or not

Variable: Dataset from Davide Chicco, Giuseppe Jurman: â€œMachine learning can predict survival of patients with heart failure from serum creatinine and ejection fraction alone. BMC Medical Informatics and Decision Making 20, 16 (2020)
